title: Steve Hackett - The Lamb Stands Up Live at the Royal Albert Hall
overview: A stunning audio/visual document of Steve Hackett's show at the iconic London venue in October 2024; Hackett and his live band celebrate the 50th anniversary of the legendary Genesis concept album 'The Lamb Lies Down on Broadway', with a selection of his favourite tracks, including 'Fly on a Windshield' and 'Lilywhite Lilith'.
